response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This offer represents a fantastic opportunity for you to maximize your investment while securing a deal that is favorable compared to alternative options available in the market. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this product to your esteemed organization.", "product_price": 12000}
